useCase.name: Take Exam

preconditions.precondition: The student has an exam to take

successEndConditions.condition: The student successfully completes the exam

failureEndConditions.condition: The exam is not completed successfully

useCase.trigger: The student selects an exam to take

mainSequence.step: The Student selects an exam to take
The UI displays a list of exams
The Student selects an exam to take
The UI validates if the exam is open to submit
The UI builds the exam for the student to take
The Student answers questions in the exam
The UI validates the student's answers
The UI calculates the exam grade percentage
The UI saves the exam grade
The UI shows feedback to the Student
